# CNSpatialAudioRenderingStyle.inFrameForegroundStem

**Case**

Isolates only voices from the camera field of view and place them in a mono stem. There is no ambience stem.

## Declaration

```swift
case inFrameForegroundStem
```
title: CNSpatialAudioRenderingStyle.inFrameForegroundStem
